page.title: 14Old People's Welfare
page.content: There are three Warden controlled Housing Units for Old Aged Pensioners on the Grange and Standalone Estates. Langleigh and Reynolds on the Grange and Sax House on the Standalone Estate. Each holds between 4O and 5O people in self contained flats all under one roof and looked after by a Warden and assistant. Langleigh is just down the road from our school. It has been there for just over 13 years and there is a plaque on one of the walls saying " This group of flats was officially opened by Miss Ursula K Thomas M.B.E. on June 1Oth 1972". It can house about 38 people because there are 36 flats and there are two couples. The oldest person is 92 years old - only one person living there has lived in Letchworth all their life.
